website_summaries.verdict: The perfect accessory kit for those who want to take their GoPro videos to the next level.
pros: Offers a high-end chest strap that works great with all GoPro cameras
Comes with a double multi-purpose wrench that enables you to quickly and securely tighten GoPro screws
Includes a floating grip mount that is bright yellow and easy to locate in water
cons: Suction cup mount tends to fall apart, even after minimal use

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is actually good quality , I had bought a GoPro brand chest strap and head stap previously,the ones included in this package looked and felt identical, every piece works amazing.Great kit it doesn't feel cheap at all.You will not be disappointed at the quality.I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LoStanley6410

customer_reviews.title: Horseback Riding and College Graduation!!
customer_reviews.text: Used this on a recent trip to Puerto Rico for a horseback riding trip. Honestly worked better than I expected. With some of the reviews about pieces breaking, I was a little hesitant to purchase it. However, I have had no issues with the equipment. I have also recently used it to attach to a graduation cap to record my friends college graduation. It gave a great POV of him walking across the stage, receiving his degree. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Great Price and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Great Price and good quality! Everything fits perfectly very good value for what you get.The plastic that these mounts are made out of is very solid. They are almost the exact same as the real gopro mounts . The suction cup is very well made and really holds . The chesty is very well made and fits nicely All in all this is very well worth the money!Definantly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Vicci

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything fits and works, but is fairly low quality. The selfie stick broke after two days of use.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Goad

customer_reviews.title: Random pieces, does not match the picture or list
customer_reviews.text: There are a ton of pieces here so depending on which ones you actually want, it can be a good value for the money. I, however, wanted the wrist mount and mine came with everything but. So I asked customer service, who sent me another one, which also did not have a wrist mount (even though there's one pictured in the description). The plastic on these is also flimsier than the normal GoPro accessories so keep in mind you get what you pay for; if you're taking your GoPro on high-intensity adventures, you may want to invest in stronger accessories.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase price, but not stellar.
customer_reviews.text: At first glance this kit is full of useful contraptions for the GoPro. Upon further use and analysis, some of it seems rather cheaply made. The float tool did not come with the wrist strap attached, nor did the the one in the package even fit around my float tool. I've had two connectors break while in the carrying pouch as well, while not being used. What I do love though is the versatility it provides for the cost. It is much cheaper than buying each accessory individually through GoPro and things like the head mount, chest mount, and wrist strap work perfectly. It's worth the purchase price for that reason to me.
customer_reviews.author: jmace5150

customer_reviews.title: GoPro Accessories Galore
customer_reviews.text: Being new to the GoPro, I wasn't sure what accessories I was going to need. This kit provided a lot of the basic gear that I would probably want to try out for a great price. Given that, I did receive most of the major pieces, however, I am missing the following: Insurance Tether Straps * 1 Helmet Strap Mount * 1 Long link*1 Short link*1 Adapter * 2 Activity base hook *1 J-hook * 1 Flat Mounts * 3 Curved Mounts * 3 Screws * 2 Flat Adhesive Pads * 3 Curved Adhesive Pads * 3 Anti-fog Inserts * 24 The quality and build seem to be solid, but only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: WArojado

customer_reviews.title: Great options - Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is just an amazing deal for the price. Sometimes I use a go pro to film some of the hard-to-get footage for our "Owie Plays" kids youtube channel. These Gopro attachments allow me to strap the camera to a toy car and send it zooming down a steep icy embankment or my own head as my son and I zoom down a hill in the sled. I have used the telescoping stick for filming footage driving down the street as well. So many options and I have used less than half of the attachments so far. They are nice quality and durable. I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: PTdash

customer_reviews.title: Good variety for little money, great for new GoPro owners.
customer_reviews.text: The float works nicely for SCUBA diving - it's comfortable and just the right size. The bike mount works, but picks up as much vibration as your surface, so you get mixed results. A lot of the other accessories look good, but I haven't had much chance to try them. The selfie stick looks like an old telescoping portable radio antenna and like those, it's fragile and won't take much abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Lots of accessories for not much money
customer_reviews.text: I haven't utilized many of the accessories that came with this bundle, but the ones I have used worked like they should. There is only one thing that I would like the kit to contain that it doesn't. I would like to be able to clamp the camera to a golf cart without the waterproof holder, using the bracket that has female screws on top and bottom. But, there isn't a clamp that comes with the male screw that would accommodate the aforementioned camera bracket. Other than that, there are lots of accessories for a variety of other mounting types.
customer_reviews.author: Motorjock047

customer_reviews.title: Great for Garmin Virb Ultra 30 and Virb 360
customer_reviews.text: I've used a lot of the mounts for 9 months now on my Garmin Virb Ultra 30 and Virb 360, and overall been very happy, especially for the low price. The Garmin action cameras all have compatible mounting hardware. One feedback: the chest mount seems like too much material, all those thick straps and buckles and the big plastic plate, I wonder if that could be streamlined. Otherwise have used the wrist mount, float handle, selfie stick, and head mount (but it feels kind of silly wearing it), and various adapters. Been down ziplines into lakes, gully washer slides, diving platforms, water falls, high ropes courses, biking, skiing. The stuff has held up fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mostafitty

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but look out for rust.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic components are well built but the screws that are used are not stainless steel, so they rust pretty quickly, even with a freshwater dip after diving in the ocean with them.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my son for a long sailing trip ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for a long sailing trip up the east coast. I sent it directly to him and he said it was very cheap and poorly constructed. He had his $500 go pro on the selfie stick doing video of the crew. End of the stick broke off sending the camera overboard. Some where of of Delaware is a brand new go pro in its water proof case. My son said there were 3 items from this kit that were worth keeping and threw the rest away. He didn't say which ones he kept or I would pass that info on. Don't buy it, it's a cheap joke
customer_reviews.author: Swift

customer_reviews.title: Great bag of tricks
customer_reviews.text: The bag contains just about every kind of attachment that you could possibly want. Experiment with them before you plan to use them so that they work the way you want them to when the time comes. They all work well, but each has its limits. I always like to hook a lanyard to the camera and then to me or to a secure connection just in case suction cup, or clip, or strap gets knocked off or gives way for some reason. I witnessed such a precaution save a friends camera that would have otherwise been lost to the ocean depths.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Float device won't secure GoPro properly, other accessories work ok.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this accessory package for the head strap and float for my GoPro Hero 5 Black. Although the head strap worked ok, the float attachment didn't. The screw attachment does not work and won't screw in to properly hold the GoPro. I tried all the other screw including the ones that came with my original GoPro. Good thing I tested it the night before going swimming into the beach or I could have lost the GoPro in the water. I do like the other attachments and it's a good deal, but the one I needed the most didn't work well.
customer_reviews.author: RexB

customer_reviews.title: Wow, so many good quality accessories.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered it along with my GoPro Hero 5 as a starter kit. Thought it would give me bang for the spent buck. Thought it would be "china" quality but would last sometime. But to my surprise this was a great quality purchase. I am utterly impressed. For the cost of just a bit over 20 bucks I got whole bag of accessories and all good sturdy quality. Check out GoPro website... for Hand + Wrist Strap you will need to pay 50$, or Chesty (Chest Harness) is 40$ or The Handler (Floating Hand Grip) is 30$ I got all of that and more for only 20+$... WOW!!! love it.
customer_reviews.author: N. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great products and excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Bought in conjunction with purchase of GoPro Hero 5. All quality accessories. I was VERY PLEASED with the functionality and "build" quality of each piece. The cost of ONE GOPRO accessory is way more than the cost for ALL of these - and with no discernible differences in quality/function. I bought a GoPro selfie stick/tripod for $60 as I was concerned with the potential quality of this kit. In retrospect I should have only bought this kit!!
customer_reviews.author: John - Copley Ohio

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good value on SOME of these pieces. One that i do not like is the suction cup mount. It is very poorly built and mine broke during normal use. the chest mount is great the tripod mounts are good the wrist mount is ok the head mount in this kit is better than the one amazon basics makes i haven't used the bar mount but it's very finicky and i'm not sure i'd trust it in the situations where i'd want to use it. so yeah for twenty bucks not bad at all
customer_reviews.author: ToeKnee0126

customer_reviews.title: Great value' Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Good choice buy it For what you pay this is easily a 5 star product.For this low price , i get everything i needed for my gopro.
customer_reviews.author: Edisonson

customer_reviews.title: ... few crashes in the snow and is holding up fine.
customer_reviews.text: Has all sorts of attachments and connections for the gopro The wrist attachment has taken a few crashes in the snow and is holding up fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great service. I would buy from these guys again.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived quickly. All items were in great condition, I hope so they are supposed to be new. All of the screws fit the holes. Nothing is misaligned. My GoPro mounts to everything quite well. Everything seemed to be in good shape and of good quality craftsmanship. The only difference between these mounting buckle and the actual GoPro mounting buckle is that these mounting buckles are missing the rubber stopper. The stopper keeps the buckle from wiggling loose once the buckles are clipped into the mounts. However, considering how tight the buckles clip into the mounts, there is not much wiggle room. Anyway, great product and great service. I would buy from these guys again.
customer_reviews.author: Tinalynn

customer_reviews.title: Best kit ever for GoPro accessories!
customer_reviews.text: Every product you'll ever need for a GoPro in one package! They all work perfectly and I don't have to spend hundreds of dollars on purchasing these products separately. All of them come in separate plastic baggies placed into one larger bag so none of the products become scratched or worn during shipment. The floating devise works great and has been extremely useful while snorkeling and going down water rapids and I don't have to worry about it ever sinking. There is also a security strap in case you want to strap it on your wrist before hand. From bicycle straps to wrist straps, this kit has it all!
customer_reviews.author: Monika P.

customer_reviews.title: Comparing the Lifelimit Accessories Starter Kit for Gopro to the Black Pro Basic Common Outdoor Sports Kit for GoPro
customer_reviews.text: Comparing the Lifelimit Accessories Starter Kit for Gopro to the Black Pro Basic Common Outdoor Sports Kit for GoPro: Almost all of the pieces were identically the same, including the head mount, chest mount, car mount, and selfie stick. The Lifelimit kit had a flexible tripod and lots of small parts you can see in the picture. The Black Pro kit had a nicer handlebar mount and floaty handle. Both are great bargains for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J

customer_reviews.title: Limitless options!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father for Christmas. The packaging is top notch, and all of the accessories give him truly limitless options. Product is to accompany the Go Pro Hero base model ($129), and so far, hasn't shown any signs of being cheaply made. The chest harness fits me (I've got a large chest) and the other accessories provide all of the accessibility one should need to record amazing video! I will buy this again, as I have made myself a go pro fan, and want to use it on the job to showcase my daily experiences!
customer_reviews.author: Jon.B803

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is an excellent set of attachments for the GoPro! The quality of most parts is also fantastic, only the selfie stick seems excessively cheap. I wouldn’t use it, but I knew that from other reviews before buying it. I bought it primarily for the head strap and chest strap, both of which are excellent. The tripod mount, float and other attachments are equally good quality and useful. I’d highly recommend for anyone not willing to spend GoPro prices for the accessories!
customer_reviews.author: Titanicfanatic

customer_reviews.title: THE FULL PACKAGE!!
customer_reviews.text: THE FULL PACKAGE! Okay so yes most of it is plastic and it does not include a water proof/protective case but it comes with EVERYTHING ELSE> Well not the GoPro itself but still. It also includes plenty of extra parts and a carrying case that I wasn't even aware it came with but it definitely will come in handy. Very much would recomend for the price being that individually buying all these items could put you well over $100!
customer_reviews.author: Dawson Routier

customer_reviews.title: Best $20 I've Spent in a LONG time!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely recommend getting this set! The quality of the mounts is first rate -- I can't tell the difference between these and the ones that came with my GoPro. The variety in the kit should cover anything you want to video. Stop thinking about it and order it. And no, I don't work for the company or know the seller, this is just a no-brainer if you're interested in action videography.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick W.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in the sack... the other parts were most packaged in zip-lock type bags. Looks super cheap upon arrival. Once opened; I've never used any of the legitimate Gopro parts, but these look and feel questionable, but in the initial use, I can't say I have any issues with it. It includes the J hook for the chest harness which is nice. I really only bought this for the Chest Harness and Head strap. Just got this a day ago, but already used the chest harness. It help up without any issues. Will update if anything breaks
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Variety of Items, Great Price, Worked Well for Us
customer_reviews.text: Although we had low expectations regarding this product because of price versus the popular name brand accessories everything in the kit we have used so far has performed well with no issues. I would recommend this item for those who are just starting out who want to test different items to see what works for them. So far, we haven't needed to purchase anything further from any other manufacturer. We would repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L

customer_reviews.title: Ok for a single-trip use. Not for avid actioon cam users or long-term use.
customer_reviews.text: If you are simply trying to get some accessories for your vacation, this might be a reasonable purchase. Most of the stuff it comes with will start to fail after 10 uses. The metal parts have all rusted after I came back from a Cancun trip. There were some splashing, but these were never submerged in the water. If you want something that you can use long-term, don't get these. If you only want to use it for a trip, go for it. One more thing, the selfie-stick is decent for the price of the kit, but very wobbly. And the metal parts on the selfie stick also rusts.
customer_reviews.author: West

customer_reviews.title: A great partner for your gopro, practice before your start shooting for work, get used to it!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of accessories honestly, I have only used the wrist, dashboard, cycle, body and head mount till date and works as advised. My personal advice is to use the mobile app for GoPro to check your view while recording or practice with the gear before you jump into shooting videos for work. A must have, but you can also buy individual items as per your need, I found that to be expensive so I invested in this, there are ones with more accessories but honestly you won't need it as much.
customer_reviews.author: dhruv sapra

customer_reviews.title: For the variety of options and the price, it's hard to beat a kit like this.
customer_reviews.text: The selfie stick is the only piece that feels a little flimsy and that it might break after a day's steady use, but the other pieces feel surprisingly durable. The floaty handle is the only one in my set where there's some difficulty attaching it to the waterproof GoPro case. The three prongs at the top of the handle are a little too narrow for the two prongs on the bottom of the case. Thankfully, once it's actually in, I don't think there's any threat of the plastic of the handle's prongs breaking. But as that was the main piece I was getting this kit for, it's a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M Hertel

customer_reviews.title: most of this is good.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good buy. It doesn't hold up well over time and cannot take a lot of beating but you are buying the cheapest on Amazon. I returned it after the car adapter broke. They refunded my money and I got to keep the rest of the set. The Selfie stick is weak. The rest seems to do good.
customer_reviews.author: Review Ru

customer_reviews.title: So Many Accessories!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son to go with his GoPro. We haven't used the suction cups, but the other mounts we've tried have been great. My only concern is quality of metal; we used some of them in the water only 1 time and they're already starting to show rust (freshwater lake). I guess for the price, oh well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs more Go Pro accessories!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needs more Go Pro accessories! There are never enough gizmos, and gadgets for your GoPro and this kit is super affordable and adds a lot of items to your set up. Take it swimming, you have a float for that. Take it running, or rock climbing or whatever, you have a chest harness, a head harness, wrist clamps, and clamps for your car, the list goes on and on. This kit is great and does a great job of providing durable accessories that will hold up to regular use, but not cost you an arm and a leg. Highly recommend, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at just how great of a deal this was. I purchased the set for $17.99. I was skeptical at first because it was so much cheaper than its competitors, but the reviews were pretty good. I took the whole set with me on a trip to Costa Rica where I did some hiking, white water rafting, waterfall repelling and a ton of swimming. It held up through everything! I love the chest and head straps. I accidentally broke one of the clips when I was detaching it from a helmet. Luckily there's an extra one in the kit. I HIGHLY recommend purchasing this one. Great deal and pretty decent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this accessory pack for my sister. She just ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this accessory pack for my sister. She just bought a Go Pro to take to Hawaii with her. This pack had everything she needed for all the action shots. She has yet to make use of all the items that came with, but everything fit right. I had a fear that these were going to be knock off as I've struggled with that stuff in the past, but there haven't been any issues since. She used the helmet clip for zip lining, the floating stick for swimming, and she also used the chest clip. There have been no issues yet.
customer_reviews.author: nyang_1982

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Do Not Use The Handlebar Mount In This Kit!
customer_reviews.text: You are getting a lot for a little money. So expect cheap. Everything in the package is fine but the handle bar mount looked and felt cheaper than normal. I anticipated trouble so I decided to tie it off with a piece of cord. It broke during my ride and my fresh out of the box GoPro would have hit the pavement at twenty miles an hour if not for the cord. Check the photo below. The fastener that holds the top to the bottom is not only too thin but not hardened and snapped.
customer_reviews.author: Paranoid Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I mainly bought this for the clip so I could mount my GoPro to my back pack strap while riding single track. But I found I use the stick all the time too. I use my GoPro on the stick as an inspection camera. Works great if you also provide a light source. I had my hood release cable break on our van, I was able to get the hood open using a rod from beneath and using my GoPro on the selfie stick to guide my hand.
customer_reviews.author: boberry

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit decent quality
customer_reviews.text: I use the floating handle the most however it is starting to rust. chest mounts just give terrible perspectives in my opinion. The car mount works flawlessly. I even stuck it on the outside on my door driving down the highway while it was raining. The selfie stick is terrible feels like it will break. The wrist mount is awkward and the bike mount stays pretty still however it will move if you land hard enough
customer_reviews.author: Team Manibusan

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts. Everything else is good.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this kit for just the screw in pieces since I have lost some over the years. It only came with 2 screw in pieces instead of the 4 In the picture. It also doesn't have the stick on pieces with the 12 stick pieces. everything seams good but missing pieces. It was cheap so I can't really complain but, the picture is a not what you will get. The chest harness is big enough for me which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kit. Comes with just about everything you would ...
customer_reviews.text: Great kit. Comes with just about everything you would ever need! Have the windshield mount in my car. Got the bar mount on my bike! I'm ready for anything! I usually have the camera running no matter what vehicle I'm in. I haven't used everything in this kit yet, but there is definitely alot!! The carry bag is not of great quality but all the items in the bag is definitely great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Chad K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Features for the Price Point
customer_reviews.text: New action cam user so all I really wanted was a head band unit and a chest cam rig. I have no clue as to how to or when to use all the other parts and pieces. Well made, good quantity of pieces and even had a selfie stick that I've yet figured out when or how to use it. I will be using head/chest rig for Trout stream fishing
customer_reviews.author: HueMan

customer_reviews.title: great accesories
customer_reviews.text: this case needs to come with 2 of the 3 prong pieces that fit on to horizontal pieces. this is most important piece to me and I only have the one that came with my cam. the selfie stick works great. the floating handle actually floats. The hat clip is very solid and sturdy. the windshield mount doesn't sit flat on my windshield. I cant speak about the pieces because I haven't used them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Brenton Ezeofor

customer_reviews.title: Go pro coolness
customer_reviews.text: A huge amount of products in a bag but they always say you get what you pay for. Majority of the parts are either broken after a 1 time use but it last me through my Miami trip. For something quick and easy buy it but for professional use probably not the best for a long run.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: This kit wasn't worth it in my opinion. All i really wanted was a suction cup mount which isn't strong enough to hold a go pro on any surface. The rest of the items have hard times clicking together and some of them I have no idea what to do with. None of the joints are strong enough to keep a go-pro steady. Instead they rotate whenever they feel like it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: EVERYTHING I could possibly need for my little camera. ...
customer_reviews.text: EVERYTHING I could possibly need for my little camera. I don't have a GoPro, nor do I need one, so I have one of those knockoffs, and these are all 100% compatible with it. MY brother does have a GoPro, and several of these pieces worked for him as well, so I would say that these are all compatible.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. O.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but super useful
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at how cheap this was because of all the items shown in the picture. I didn't think I'd be getting everything shown and listed in the product description, but I did. You really do get everything you see. The plastic is cheap and will eventually break (one of my small mounts started cracking after a few weeks) but it's still a good value for the price. You get like three small mounts anyway. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Desire Findlay

customer_reviews.title: I really like the harness that wraps around your body
customer_reviews.text: I have only used three of the items so far. I really like the harness that wraps around your body. I went cliff diving, and thought it was super helpful so I didn't have to worry about dropping my go pro. I would recommend this set because it comes with a whole bunch of things you can prop your go-pro to. I have no idea on durability yet, but I will update this as I need to
customer_reviews.author: Melina

customer_reviews.title: Made of durable material.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice kit. The bicycle mount is well designed, and much better than the dual screw setup included in most kits. Very clean mount. The rest of the accessories seem very strong, and the suction cup mount is also nicely made. All strap mount appear to be well made. I have used most of the mounts, and I feel that I got more than my money's worth. A very good value.
customer_reviews.author: A.C

customer_reviews.title: Great deal! Happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: Being new to GoPro I found this kit extraordinarily useful! All the components seem like they are very well manufactured so no complaints in that department. I have never used the actual GoPro brand for these items so can't compare but what I can say is that the price for them is ridiculous. Headband and chest mount alone would run about $60 in Walmart! I like how the selfie stick has grooves so when you attach a camera it doesn't rotate while extended. Suction cup on car mount is very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Mike O.

customer_reviews.title: Great as a sample pack or someone who needs a temporary fix
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad price for everything you get. But it is not of the greatest quality. I'd say this is perfect for someone looking for a creative tool for shooting videos but not sure what they want or like. Treat it like a sample pack, if it's awesome to use get that item of a higher quality. For example I liked what I could do with the selfie stick, but it completely fell apart on day 4 of a fishing trip and my GoPro nearly went to live with the fish.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't very happy with that but for the price and amount of ...
customer_reviews.text: This pack comes with an insane amount of attachments and gear. I knew the product I was going to use most was the selfie stick and unfortunately the one I got is wobbly so I get wobbly videos when I use it. I tightened everything and it is just the mounting that is loose. I wasn't very happy with that but for the price and amount of equipment it is a good deal. I like the clip a lot as well. I didn't expect to like it very much but I was impressed with it the most.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kinda like it. For the price its pretty cool.
customer_reviews.text: Got what I really wanted like head strap ,chest strap, and clip which works great. The car mount is trash. Do like the hand held float it has a nice grip . I Kinda kick my self . should have gotten the 50 piece . And spent the extra few bucks. BUT, for what I pay I still pay less if I was going to pay at a store for what I really wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Tacomycat

customer_reviews.title: A lot of stuff for a little $$!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe all the stuff you get for this low price. When I first got my GoPro I paid the same amount for any one of these items that I paid for this entire kit. I bought it specifically for the suspender vest and it works well. I suppose some day I use the other components also. Bottom line - I'm very pleased with the equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Tony M

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Everything is pretty legit for the price. The bag has some stupid writing on it though . I won't be using it at all and I'll have to buy something else. The black bag says "black pro" and below that is written " professional accessories to be with you" obviously it is the result of poor translation. Other than that it's pretty cool and well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Huggins

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: A little Confusing, it doesn't come with manuals so I could see how one would be confused as far as how to use every single thing that comes in this bundle. Having said that, it is a great deal if you figure it out, because it is pretty comprehensive. Also not the best quality but for the price I guess it is not bad, If you are just starting to play with the GoPro then this is probably enough...
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto A Egoavil

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I mean the items are plastic and not the best quality. That being said you get what you pay for. They aren't as rugged. If you over tighten the knobs you will easily break the plastic pieces the float hand held stick somehow got water in it, basically it leaked, it didn't sink my go pro though. It was just annoying hearing water in it. It eventually dried out. After experiencing all this I may just buy a better quality set next time.
customer_reviews.author: Luis & Karla

customer_reviews.title: they work just fine. I would not say they are as good ...
customer_reviews.text: they work just fine. I would not say they are as good as gopro oem parts. but it works, I m not use all of them, just some of them, they work just like it suppose to be. But this kit is cheap.... Think about the price, they worth this price. they are not the best, but they are value kit.
customer_reviews.author: Brick

customer_reviews.title: Very glad of this purchase as this camera is great for ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought all the GoPro4 Bundle, with all the straps (Sport Kit), batteries and memory cards, Very glad of this purchase as this camera is great for adventures, I have used it in zip lining, roller coasters, mountain bike, ATV, Bungee Jumping, sea and mountain trips and its awesome. You have to buy the replacement batteries if you record a lot and remember to charge them well before any activity. The Sport Kit is great, you have the straps for everything.
customer_reviews.author: MarcHN

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.  Get the version with a Case rather than a bag
customer_reviews.text: The items seem better quality than I anticipated, though there were two small pieces that fit too tight and feel like they could break the waterproof housing of my Apeman camera. Really though, the harnesses aren't cheap feeling. I should have purchased the version of this that comes with a case because now I have to empty the sack of all the contents to get what I want.
customer_reviews.author: Old Romans

customer_reviews.title: Good start kit!
customer_reviews.text: All what you need to start filming away with your GoPro, the only accsesorie I don't like is the windshield mount... Even though it feels attached and firm... The result of the video recording is shaky. So I would buy the original GoPro windshield mount instead of using this one. Everything else works great and there is a lot of stuff included.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: The suction cup is garbage also. If you can pull it of a ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this if you want quality. The extension stick broke on the very first use. If you just want the standard clip-in mounts, that is about the only thing this kit has going for it. I'm throwing mine away. The suction cup is garbage also. If you can pull it of a smooth metallic surface with ease then what do you think will happen at speed. I don't trust a $500 go pro on a this equipment. You definitely get what you pay for with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Plyler

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: I would have gave it 5 stars but there are no instructions included. The quality seems top notch and it's ridiculous how much you get for the price. Basically the price of 1 official GoPro accessory. I used it on my Motorcycle-very secure and nothing to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Great price, low quality. I purchased it for a trip. The selfie stick is flimsy and eventually broke. The rest I've used just once or twice. The head hear came in handy when I was snorkeling. Do I absolutely hate it? No . Would I purchase it again? No. But I wouldn't return it because it served its purpose and didn't cost much
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: No threaded bayonet mount included
customer_reviews.text: Twenty bucks is a fair price for some of the gear you get. I believe the labelled this as "Black" hoping to attract those that bought the Hero Black. It is a Chinese product do lets hope they copied the original well. My bag did not come with extra parts that are likely to break as I read in other reviews. The one big missing piece is the threaded camera/bayonet mount for which the handlebar, dash mount and selfie stick require. I was hoping to use on my SUP paddle for underwater shots of fish I encounter.
customer_reviews.author: landscape architect

customer_reviews.title: Lots of goodies
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as part of our Go Pro gear before I cruise to the Caribbean. There are many little "goodies" in this kit that make it a worth while buy. Although, I don't believe I'll use everything that was included, ever, there are some really good adaptors and rigs to allow you to use your camera in many different scenarios.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Salt Water Lovers Beware!
customer_reviews.text: The cost is affordable and the products do the job. I would recommend this to Parents, Beginners, Frugal Buyers, Casual GoPro Users who might not want/ cant afford to buy the "top of the line" bundles. The only negative I have is that the metal parts became rust after using them during snorkeling/ swimming/ cliff jumping/ jet skiing. I also wish that the chest piece could fit tighter.
customer_reviews.author: BargainSwagg

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This is the same quality and material as the GoPro brand kit but so much cheaper. I have used this multiple times and for a variety of different things and it hasn't let me down. It is great material and very durable. If you are just getting into filming and don't want to spend a fortune on an accessory kit I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Dolmanet

customer_reviews.title: Great Initially, But...
customer_reviews.text: While MOST of the things included in this set are of great quality, the contrary is also true. When I received my package, the first thing that I noticed was how well most of it was made - particularly the mounts with a fabric/elastic strap. It wasn't until a few weeks later that I noticed a few of the plastic pieces have cracked and broken. While the straps and the thicker plastic parts are great, both of the adapters have already broken for me. Luckily I was not in a situation that I could lose my camera in the process.
customer_reviews.author: Tigered22

customer_reviews.title: Wide Variety of Gadgets!
customer_reviews.text: Got my husband a Go Pro Hero 5 Bundle for Christmas & this accessories kit was for Valentine's Day. He loves all of the pieces & has has a lot of fun testing them out. He can't wait to go canoeing this summer, so we can really put this kit to use on the river. Very pleased with the wide variety of gadgets that come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Perry

customer_reviews.title: We're very happy with these items
customer_reviews.text: We're very happy with these items. It has absolutely everything. And you can't beat the price. Each piece came wrapped in its own individual ziploc bag. It also has a drawstring bag included as well. We went river rafting and used the head strap, chest strap, selfie stick float piece. They attached easily to our GoPro and were easy to use. We're very happy with these items and would recommend them to others. The seller was also great. Items arrived quickly and were packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: RYAN K ANGLIN

customer_reviews.title: Versatile mounts for the GoPro costing way less than separate products
customer_reviews.text: I use the head, chest and selfie stick mounts frequently with my GoPro Hero 5 Black. They work fine. I can't imagine how they could be improved. From what I've seen online, they are the same as products sold separately at greater cost. I like having various other mounts like the clip and the suction stand in case these would be appropriate for the situation. There are parts in the collection I haven't even studied. Very cool to have.
customer_reviews.author: Caroling Wholeo

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kit for the money, BUT!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice Kit for the money, BUT!! Where are the instructions?? Some of the attachments are obvious, like the head strap, car and bike mounts, but theres little pieces and screws that instructions would really help out. The pictures on the selection help a little, but one piece of paper would make this 5*. I haven't had a real full field test to see if the plastic breaks as many have said, but I did get the whole kit for less than just a head strap. Will update if everything breaks.
customer_reviews.author: The Bernz

customer_reviews.title: Lots of stuff to choose from.
customer_reviews.text: You can get the amazon basics chest mount for 14 dollars, or all this for 12... It's a no brainer. It's all china goodness but it does the job. It will do everything you need and then some. It has a lot of cool attachments that you'll probably end up using at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J

customer_reviews.title: Unreal
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe a kit this inexpensive is as good in quality as it is. You will never need another kit if you buy this, it has everything and everything works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: matt boshar

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, brittle plastic garbage
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for... I bought this in Jan 2016 and just now opened and starting using it. Literally every single piece has cracked and broken. Has been stored inside, in cool room temps. I can't believe the positive reviews on this!
customer_reviews.author: Hashu Deikus

customer_reviews.title: A LOT of pieces
customer_reviews.text: Definitely more than I'm ever gonna use, but having the options are great, the chest strap works well, the selfie stick works great and the backpack clip work perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price -> Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Pro - A literal bag full of goodies for your gopro for under $15. Con - Yes a couple of items are poor quality as others have stated. Overall - A great value! No matter how you want to mount your gopro... this kit has a solution. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: PeteK

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Plastic, but a few good parts
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with my GoPro Hero 4 Black. From the day I bought it, 2 months ago, I have broken both tripod mounts, and the tool. The plastic is very cheap, and easily breaks. The suction cup, and the floaty handle are the only good things in the entire set. Everything else is very cheap. I will not be recommending this to anyone, nor buying it again..
customer_reviews.author: Chris Todd

customer_reviews.title: For $27 this was a great deal! These are definitely cheap chinese parts
customer_reviews.text: For $27 this was a great deal! These are definitely cheap chinese parts, but they do the job well and it's no worse than the official GoPro parts. The straps are good quality, as are the buckles. The quick release mounts are really tight and can be a pain compared to genuine GoPro ones, but not that big of a deal. I'd definitely buy this set again.
customer_reviews.author: CTD_Chevrolet

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product and povider
customer_reviews.text: Wow... this is exactly as advertised. I can't believe how they can put this package together at the price point. Everything shown works and functions perfectly. I used many components on a recent raft trip down the Grand Canyon and also on a dive trip to the Grand Cayman wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good mounts! Better than the expensive go pro mounts!
customer_reviews.text: I love these months! These are way better than go close loans because they are so expensive, these amounts are much better and the quality is very good pretty durable I should recommend this, do not buy the go pros products because they are very expensive, by these amounts they are good price.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera Mount Kit
customer_reviews.text: I only need one item in the kit, but what I pad by getting this was a great deal. The one pice I needed local, was $19.95. But now I see I am using the other pics in the kit. I am using it for my "InstaOne 3D Camera", but I can see where I could use it on my other cameras. So it's not just for the Black Pro, but works for most other cameras you need to mount.
customer_reviews.author: Norm W.

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Getting all these for around 14 bucks is a really sweet deal. I'm really satisfied with the quality of the material. Only complain is that it comes in like a bag and there are no instructions or anything, so I had to spend a long time figuring out what went where and some parts I could not even figure out what to do with. So probably include a organized box and instructions and it's a sure 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Slauxter

customer_reviews.title: It is cheaply made, but okay. If you can afford better, get something better.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Overall I am happy, but some of the items are cheaply made. The clamp broke the first time I used it. The metal pin that holds the spring in broke. I can fix it with a screw, but seriously, it was the very first time I touched it. Thankfully the camera did not get any damage. I think it is a good starting out kit, but if you can afford something a little more expensive, I suggest getting it.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Some may like the bag better but it all just thrown in ...
customer_reviews.text: This has a little bit of everything in this set. My only complaint is there should be a little carry case for them instead of a draw string bag but the description tells you there is a bag. Some may like the bag better but it all just thrown in there and hard to get to the small pieces This is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan P

customer_reviews.title: This accessories kit includes a ton of mounting accessories for ...
customer_reviews.text: This accessories kit includes a ton of mounting accessories for the GoPro. Some of our favorites are: floating handle, selfie stick, and the head and chest straps. I'm giving it 4 stars because it didn't include any kind of list of what each accessory was and how to use them. Some of them are a little hard to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Eggers

customer_reviews.title: A Smashing Deal
customer_reviews.text: I only use a few mounts, and the extra skewers, but those few things separately would cost more. The individual pieces all seem like good quality. I used the wrist mount to attach my GoPro to a sledgehammer. I handed it to a friend who smashed watermelons with it, and she was very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Oaks

customer_reviews.title: I suppose the product is fine according to it's cost
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the clip switch and suction cup primarily. Suction cup tends to come off sometimes so I wouldn't risk using it outside a vehicle unrestrained, and it starts shaking sometimes. Also the hand grip doesn't come included with the fastener as shown in the image. I suppose the product is fine according to it's cost. It has extra screws which are helpful but extra GoPro mounts are sort of useless because this product itself doesn't use the GoPro stands.
customer_reviews.author: shubham kushwaha

customer_reviews.title: Best value GoPro kit on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, after purchasing several similar kits I can safely say this particular one was above and beyond the others in terms of quality, durability and functionality. Has everything you need to capture every moment of your adventures.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Nearly lost my GoPro
customer_reviews.text: At first it looks like a good deal, but I can’t trust any of it after using the handlebar mount on an ATV that snapped from being jolted around by barely rough terrain. Was lucky that the camera landed underneath the shifter.
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: This set is great. Quality seems as good as most of the ...
customer_reviews.text: This set is great. Quality seems as good as most of the actual GOPRO accessories I have purchased in the past. Very good price for the whole set. The only thing that felt cheap was the selfie pole but I won't likely use it anyhow.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mrozinski

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and everything you need!
customer_reviews.text: When I saw the price I was expecting junk, but I was totally blown away with what I got for $12!! From what I can tell as I haven't put it into use yet, the quality it up there! Even if half of it falls apart its still excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Has Almost Everything You Need But A Couple Fails
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit as a starter for my new Go Pro Hero 5. Primarily purchased for the floating and selfie sticks. When I opened the kit I found I was unable to mount my go pro to the floating stick because the grooves at the top of the stick are not spread far enough apart. Also the "tool" is useless because only one half came with the kit. All other mounts seem to fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: dbroth

customer_reviews.title: Solid Beginner GoPro Kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit is very quality, and I have had no problems with any of the products. The head and chest mounts are very secure and comfortable to wear. The elastic is very think and has good stretch to it. The inside of the elastic has some sticky lines to help the mounts stay in place, there is no shifting, even when your head is moving with the weight of the GoPro on it. The videos have turned out really well from both mounts. The selfie stick and floating handle are very secure and both work very well. I have not used all of the sticky mounts but the 3m attachments are very quality. Overall, I love using this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Zobrist

customer_reviews.title: the mount adapters aren't the best quality and I have had to super glue some ...
customer_reviews.text: This kit contains a reasonable selection of accessories. However, the mount adapters aren't the best quality and I have had to super glue some of them back together. In my kit, they tend to break in the area of the nut that the clamping screw tightens against. My factory gopro mounts havent encountered this particular issue. Also I took some of these mounts into the ocean and noticed that the salt water caused the aftermarket screw to rust. I have attached a photo which shows an OEM gopro screw after having been in the ocean (Left) vs one of the screws in this kit (Right).
customer_reviews.author: computerguru

customer_reviews.title: Chest mount is my favorite, I used the sticky back to mount on ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't complain to much here! Got exactly what I believed I was buying. They do consider every little piece one of the pieces in the kit. It's all very valuable, considering I document every daily adventure I come upon. Chest mount is my favorite, I used the sticky back to mount on my dash in my truck, hasn't came off yet, but I don't think I would chance mounting it on my kayaks...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... know what to do with if you are anything like me, but the water floatie handle
customer_reviews.text: Lots of little pieces you will probably lose and probably not know what to do with if you are anything like me, but the water floatie handle, chest strap and head-lamp style strap make it a good package.
customer_reviews.author: --Brown

customer_reviews.title: gear will rust
customer_reviews.text: given it's low quality, many of the equipment started to rust after use in the ocean. if you're looking for something to last you in the long run, definitely invest in higher quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

product_meta.title: Black Pro Camera Accessory Kit Compatible with GoPro Hero 8/AKASO
product_meta.description:
Buy as a kit and save. These are awesome accessories for Black Pro Basic Common Outdoor Sports Kit for GoPro Hero 6 /GoPro Fusion/HERO 5/Session5/ 4 / 3+ / 3 / 2 / 1 SJ4000 /5000/ 6000 /AKASO/ APEMAN/ DBPOWER/ And Sony Sports DV and More（64 in 1）. 

Package Includes: Wrist band * 1 
Headband * 1 
Pouch * 1 
Bicycle clip * 1 
Chest strap * 1 
Extendable Handle Monopod * 1 
360 degree rotation backpack clip * 1 
Cleaning cloth * 1 
Car Suction Cup Mount Holder * 1 
Tool*1 
Floating Handle Grip * 1 
Strap * 1 
Insurance Tether Straps * 1 
Helmet Strap Mount * 1 
Long link*1
Short link*1
Adapter * 2 
Activity base hook *3
J-hook * 3 
Flat Mounts * 3
Curved Mounts * 3
Screws * 4
Flat Adhesive Pads * 3
Curved Adhesive Pads * 3
Anti-fog Inserts * 24
Warranty！！！ 
All items purchased from “mankeyking” are ensured with a top quality
and you can enjoy a 30 Days Money Back or Free Exchange against man-made damage from date of purchase and 24 Hours friendly customer service!
feature_bullets: Chest strap：Lets you wear all GoPro cameras (except Digital HERO 5 Wrist Camera) on your chest Comfortable, fully-adjustable design fits all shapes and sizes, including over large jackets Perfect mount for skiing, kayaking, biking, motocross, equestrian and other action sports Lets you capture your knees & skis on the slopes, or your bike frame & handlebars Easy way to share the filming with your friends
Headband：Features of the Head Strap Mount Fully adjustable to fit all sizes, the Head Strap is compatible with all GoPro cameras and great for keeping the footage clear while you shred .
Wrist strap mount：Wrist strap mount for GoPro Hero cameras. You can wear this strap while surfing and bicycling

Floating Grip Mount + Long Screw. Floating holder is designed to keep your camera with a waterproof shell (sold separately) easy to float on the water. Bright yellow in the water and can easily be found.

The new design double multi-purpose wrench, fit for both gopro screws, so you have to be able to calmly deal with a variety of screws, convenient Easily Tighten Your GoPro Thumb Screws: The Tool makes it easy to tighten your GoPro thumb screws more securely than by hand. Secures your camera: Tighter thumb screws help prevent the camera from tilting up or down during high-speed, high vibration activities such as surfing and mountain biking. Increases Stability: Ideal for tightening your thumb screws to achieve greater stability when mounting the camera with multiple extension arms. Perfect for Frigid Temps + Frozen Fingers: Easily adjust thumb screws in cold conditions despite numb fingers.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,188 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
